name: Beaver Beginnings
description:
A cute, simple 2-D visual novel where the player moves to a new town full of possibilities! Explore your new surroundings and meet your colorful cast of eccentric neighbors! But wait...there are secrets hiding within this same town...do you dare to uncover these secrets?

Dev Team:

Santiago Vega - Lead Writer & Team Lead

Colby Breitenbach - Sound Designer

Richard Derkman - Lead Programmer.

Andrei Gulapa -  Programmer & Level Design

Rox Follett - Character Designer/Artist

Shane Moore - Environmental Artist
